PresentationColumn.name: Cash Status
PresentationColumn.Description: Status to indicate whether the party is 'Active' or 'Lapsed' if they are a cash donor

PresentationColumn.name: CoG Status
PresentationColumn.Description: Status to indicate whether the party is one of various states if they are a CoG donor

PresentationColumn.name: Tenure
PresentationColumn.Description: Number of years since first donation date

PresentationColumn.name: Total Donation Count
PresentationColumn.Description: The number of donation records on the Party's record where the donation amount can be positive or negative (includes refunds and reversals).

PresentationColumn.name: Total Donation Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: The total amount given by the Party to the charity (sum of all donations). This is the Gross Amount (inclusive of Gift Aid).

PresentationColumn.name: No of Donations Received
PresentationColumn.Description: The number of donation records on the Party's record where the donation amount is greater than zero.

PresentationColumn.name: Largest Gross Donation Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: Largest Donation Amount including Gift Aid that has been processed (Actual Completed).

PresentationColumn.name: Largest Donation Date
PresentationColumn.Description: The date of the largest donation the owning party has given to CRUK.

PresentationColumn.name: First Gross Donation Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: First Donation Amount including Gift Aid that has been processed (Actual Completed).

PresentationColumn.name: First Donation Date
PresentationColumn.Description: The date of the first donation the owning party has given to CRUK.

PresentationColumn.name: Last Donation Date
PresentationColumn.Description: The date of the last donation the owning party has given to CRUK.

PresentationColumn.name: Total Net Donation Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: The total Net amount given by the Party to the charity (sum of all donations).

PresentationColumn.name: First Net Donation Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: The amount of the first donation the owning party has given to CRUK

PresentationColumn.name: Last Net Donation Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: The amount of the last donation the owning party has given to CRUK

PresentationColumn.name: Largest Net Donation Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: The amount of the largest donation the owning party has given to CRUK

PresentationColumn.name: Last Gross Donation Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: Latest Donation Amount including Gift Aid that has been processed (Actual Completed).
